mapper.select: SELECT MEMBER_NO, MEMBER_ID, MEMBER_PW, MEMBER_NAME, MEMBER_PHONE, MEMBER_NICKNAME, MEMBER_INTRO, MEMBER_PROFILE, MEMBER_COVER_IMG, MEMBER_DELETE_FLAG, AUTHORITY, MEMBER_BIRTH, TO_CHAR(MEMBER_ENROLLDATE, 'YYYY"년" MM"월" DD"일" HH24"시" MI"분" SS"초"') AS MEMBER_ENROLLDATE FROM "MEMBER" WHERE MEMBER_DELETE_FLAG = 'N' AND MEMBER_ID = #{memberId}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO "MEMBER" VALUES(SEQ_MEMBER_NO.NEXTVAL , '${memberId}' , '${memberPw}' , '${memberName}' , '${memberTel}' , '${memberNickname}' , null , null , null , DEFAULT, DEFAULT, DEFAULT , '${memberEmail}' , '${memberBirth}')
mapper.select: SELECT MEMBER_NICKNAME FROM MEMBER WHERE MEMBER_ID = #{username} AND MEMBER_DELETE_FLAG = 'N'
SELECT MEMBER_ID, MEMBER_NICKNAME, MEMBER_PROFILE FROM MEMBER WHERE (MEMBER_ID = #{value} OR MEMBER_NICKNAME = #{value}) AND MEMBER_DELETE_FLAG = 'N'
SELECT CASE WHEN EXISTS ( SELECT 1 FROM MEMBER WHERE MEMBER_NICKNAME = #{nickname} AND MEMBER_DELETE_FLAG = 'N' ) THEN 'true' ELSE 'false' END AS result FROM DUAL
